sentence.Network_en: Stasik looked at him pityingly and said nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯塔西克满怀同情地看着他，一言不发。

sentence.Network_en: The nurse looked at him pityingly.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1. 依据pityingly 可怜地pivot 枢轴

entry.tran: 表示同情（或怜悯、可怜）的
entry.def: A pitying look shows that someone feels pity and perhaps slight contempt.

example.ex: She gave him a pitying look; that was the sort of excuse her father would use.
example.tran: 她怜悯地看了他一眼，这类借口是她父亲会用的。

auth_sentence.content: I heard they held up garments' " Mormon sacramental underwear " in church last Sunday, too,' my mother told me, pityingly.
auth_sentence.res_content: I heard they held up garments' " Mormon sacramental underwear " in church last Sunday, too,' my mother told me, pityingly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I heard they held up garments' " Mormon sacramental underwear " in church last Sunday, too,' my mother told me, pityingly.
